element.name: rpbody
element.sql: SELECT os.name state, p.state_date, s.code, p.id_name, package_field(p.source, p.id, 1) fio, package_field(p.source, p.id, 18) adr, GREATEST(1, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(pb.box_number),0) FROM package_barcode pb WHERE pb.source = p.source AND pb.id = p.id)) packs, p.delivery_name, package_field(p.source, p.id, 19)+0.0 deb FROM package p INNER JOIN order_state os ON os.id = p.state INNER JOIN sources s ON s.id = p.source WHERE p.state < 500 AND p.state_date BETWEEN :pfrom AND DATE_ADD( :pto , INTERVAL 1 DAY) ORDER BY p.state, p.state_date
